title: How is that possible? FIFA 17's free-kick goals of the week redefine the laws of physics
text:
Get daily   
One of the new features released with FIFA 17 was the enhanced way of taking free-kicks. Players can now move their free-kick taker around the ball and create all sorts of results. 
Moving the footballer around the ball, just like in real life, means the player hits the ball with different parts of his/her foot, therefore creating different spin. 
Combine this with a power shot and all sorts of craziness ensues. Gone are the days of your standard up and down curler. (Photo: EA SPORTS FIFA/Youtube) 
As seen in the above video, EA released a special free-kick goals of the week - and the results were mind boggling. 
Gamers have managed to get the best out of Lionel Messi, Arjen Robben and even Simone Zaza by using the new technique to their advantage. (Photo: EA SPORTS FIFA/Youtube)
